title: How to convince my mom to skip online school - Quora

response.answer_text: Is she getting her bachelor’s degree or a masters? Why do you want her to stop studying, is she not paying enough attention to you? On the other hand i think you need school, seriously, considering I still don’t know who is doing the online school. If it’s you remember, I’d you don’t take classes you’re truant and your mom can get into a lot of trouble for that. And to be truant means that you are skipping school. Doesn’t matter if it’s in person or online. And you really need school.

Are you doing online schooling or mum? If you the one doing on line schooling, I can understand if you want to give it up! It must be very boring? At least at school you have brakes and meet up with your friends and share personal news and have fun! But if it's for mum than dont discourage her, at least at the end after looking after her family and they all leave home, has something to fall back on! Encourage and praise her for being brave!

One excuse can be- your eyes hurting, getting dry and itchy due to continuous online classes. Once in a while you can take a break. If you use this excuse to skip every session, than mom being a mom, will take you to an Eye specialist or get you some eyedrops for itchy eyes. So use the Excuse frugally.

Why do you need to skip online school? Are you feeling uncomfortable? Have some kind of sickness? Or something important/serious? If you are, please talk to your mom about it. Otherwise………DO YOUR ONLINE SCHOOL. Don’t skip it. ~Linki
Admit you're a knucklehead. With out a high school diploma, you can't even get in the military anymore! Maybe you could a job at McDonalds asking, “Do you want fries with that?”
You dont. There Is not way to win an argument or convince a mother. I know because I tried that a few days ago and am in 9th grade, so i have been through this situation.
